tools.description: Call to run type checks and / or tell the task is completed

is_complete.description: True if task is completed false if just running type checks

tools.name: mark_complete

content.text:
OK. I've added the emojis to the specified text elements in `client/src/App.tsx`.

Here's a summary of the changes:
- The main title "Click Counter" is now "🎯 Click Counter 🚀".
- The "Click Me!" button text is now "➕ Click Me! 🎉".
- The "Loading..." text is now "⏳ Loading...".
- The "Incrementing..." text is now "⏳ Incrementing...".
